snippet.title: 2012 Tech Predictions: A Look Back
snippet.description:
2012 Tech Predictions: A Look Back
By Chris Ciaccia 08:00 AM EST 12/04/12
TheStreet reviews its 10 tech predictions for 2012. Some were spot on, others way off base.
http://www.thestreet.com/story/11781521/1/2012-tech-predictions-a-look-back.html
